title: How to Speak Without Spitting Saliva

steps.headline: Practice in front of a mirror.
steps.description: This also helps with conquering lisps, stuttering, and most other speech problems.

steps.headline: Tell yourself you are going to fix the problem.
steps.description: Self motivation is big in this.

steps.headline: Always swallow before you speak.
steps.description: This almost always eliminates most of the problem.

steps.headline: Don't speak too fast.
steps.description: Speaking fast always increases the risk of spitting.

steps.headline: Always be confident!
steps.description: Being confident and believing in yourself is the key to getting over any problem (except overconfidence).
